abstract: Hot stories today from Microsoft, Apple, Palm, Buy.com, Dell and more.
snippet: Hot stories today from Microsoft, Apple, Palm, Buy.com, Dell and more.
lead_paragraph: Dell bought Zing, a consumer electronics software company. Dell’s other consumer electronics ventures, like the Dell DJ MP3 player, have been flops. [GigaOm, Release]

headline.main: Quick Bits: Dell Tries Zing, Steve Case Sells Lime, Palm Hears Silence
